duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in a 10-12 week Operations summer internship at the processing plant, gaining exposure to projects and assignments within Operations.
Develop technical skills and problem-solving abilities through hands-on experiences and developmental training.
Work with associate peers and senior leadership to build affiliations and interaction within the company.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduates in their junior year pursuing degrees in Agri-Business, Animal Science, Food Science, Meat Science, Ag Leadership, Business, Supply Chain, or related field
